```{r}
library(haven)
library(tidyverse)
allbus <- read_sav("allbus.sav")

table(allbus$year)
```



```{r}
allbus$ingle

df <- allbus %>%
  select(ingle, year)%>%
  drop_na()%>%
  group_by(year)%>%
  reframe(
    ingle = mean(ingle)
  )
  

```

```{r}

df

df <- allbus %>%
  select(ingle, year)%>%
  drop_na()%>%
  group_by(year)%>%
  count(ingle == 4)
  
  
dfTrue <- df[df$`ingle == 4` == TRUE,]
dfFalse <- df[df$`ingle == 4` == FALSE,]


dfTrue$ingle_rel <- dfTrue$n/dfFalse$n


a <- allbus[allbus$year == 2014,]
table(a$ingle)
```
